title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Aug 11 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Aug 11 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2: School boards pushing Critical Race Theory. Oregon governor signs bill ending reading and math proficiency requirements for graduation. Clay and Buck welcome American Majority & Voter Gravity's Ned Ryun to the show to discuss the failure of school boards across the country. Covid lockdowns shined a light on the indoctrination of the education system. Will the $3.5 trillion budget bill pass the senate? Mask wearing can cause anxiety.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
